name: Bekkus
description:
A young scientist was travelling around the world when suddenly a meteor crashed, releasing all kind of creatures with its impact. Now, determined as ever, the young scientist has decided to investigate them and gather as much information as she can by photographing them.

-WE WANT TO CLARIFY THIS IS OUR EARLY ACCES GAME, WE HOPE EVERYONE LIKES IT AND PROVIDES US FEEDBACK-

JOIN OUR AWESOME DISCORD!  

https://discord.gg/dFgGte

OUR GAME FEATURES:

-Take photos of Bekkus

-Collect their info

-Sell the pictures of the bekkus
